name: media-hoarder
description: Media Hoarder - THE media frontend for data hoarders and movie lovers
author: mk2k <npm@hoarder.software> (https://media.hoarder.software)

scripts.dev:beta: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && vue invoke electron-builder && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.beta vue-cli-service electron:serve
scripts.dev:stable: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && vue invoke electron-builder && npx dotenv-cli -e .env vue-cli-service electron:serve
scripts.electron:build-linux-portable: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=true && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux && mv dist_electron/linux-unpacked media-hoarder-portable && npx bestzip RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64-portable.zip media-hoarder-portable && npx rimraf media-hoarder-portable && node set-portable --portable=false && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-linux-setup: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=false && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux deb appimage snap rpm && mv dist_electron/*.deb RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.deb && mv dist_electron/*.AppImage RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.AppImage && mv dist_electron/*.snap RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.snap && mv dist_electron/*.rpm RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.rpm && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-mac: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=false && vue-cli-service electron:build --mac dmg && mv dist_electron/*.dmg RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-mac.dmg && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-rpi: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && vue-cli-service electron:build --dir --linux --armv7l deb appimage
scripts.electron:build-win-portable: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=true && npx dotenv-cli -e .env vue-cli-service electron:build --win && mv dist_electron/win-unpacked media-hoarder-portable && npx bestzip RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-win-x64-portable.zip media-hoarder-portable && npx rimraf media-hoarder-portable && node set-portable --portable=false && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-win-portable-beta: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=true && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.beta vue-cli-service electron:build --win && mv dist_electron/win-unpacked media-hoarder-portable && npx bestzip RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-win-x64-portable.zip media-hoarder-portable && npx rimraf media-hoarder-portable && node set-portable --portable=false && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-win-setup: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=false && npx dotenv-cli -e .env vue-cli-service electron:build --win && mv dist_electron/*.exe RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-win-x64-setup.exe && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-win-setup-beta: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && bash ./apply-monkeypatches.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=false && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.beta vue-cli-service electron:build --win && mv dist_electron/*.exe RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-win-x64-setup.exe && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
